title: Set alias for columns in data set, but in expression builder it still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When I set an alias for columns in a data set and then go to the expression builder, it still shows the old column names when I select the dataset.
EB: After setting aliases for columns in a data set, the expression builder should display the updated alias names when selecting the dataset.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new data source and a data set.
2. Set the alias of the first column in the data set to "column1".
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the data set.
4. Open the expression builder and select the data set.
5. Verify that the column name displayed in the expression builder matches the alias name set in step 2.
